author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Allows you to create a single file. file-path or entry_id must be specified.
commands.name: gitlab-file-create

commands.description: Delete a file in the repository.
commands.name: gitlab-file-delete

commands.description: Get all merge requests for this project.
commands.name: gitlab-merge-request-list

commands.description: Gets a list of all notes for a single merge request.
commands.name: gitlab-merge-request-note-list

commands.description: Deletes a branch from the repository.
commands.name: gitlab-branch-delete

commands.description: Get a list of a project's issues.
commands.name: gitlab-issue-list

commands.description: Get a list of repository branches from a project, alphabetically sorted by name.
commands.name: gitlab-branch-list

commands.description: Gets job details.
commands.name: gitlab-jobs-list

commands.description: Modify existing note of a merge request.
commands.name: gitlab-merge-request-note-update

commands.description: Gets the details of the pipeline schedules.
commands.name: gitlab-pipelines-schedules-list

commands.description: Get a list of repository commits in a project.
commands.name: gitlab-commit-list

commands.description: Creates a new note for a single project issue.
commands.name: gitlab-issue-note-create

commands.description: Gets the details of the pipelines.
commands.name: gitlab-pipelines-list

commands.description: Gets information about a file in the repository, such as name, size, content.
commands.name: gitlab-file-get

commands.description: Retrieve version information for this GitLab instance.
commands.name: gitlab-version-get

commands.description: Gets an artifact from a given artifact path, corresponding to a given job ID.
commands.name: gitlab-artifact-get

commands.description: Get the users list of a project.
commands.name: gitlab-project-user-list

commands.description: Get a list of all visible projects across GitLab for the authenticated user. When accessed without authentication, only public projects with simple fields are returned.
commands.name: gitlab-project-list

commands.description: Creates a new note for a single merge request.
commands.name: gitlab-merge-request-note-create

commands.description: Edit an existing file in the repository.
commands.name: gitlab-file-update

commands.description: Modify an existing note of an issue.
commands.name: gitlab-issue-note-update

commands.description: Get the file in a raw format.
commands.name: gitlab-raw-file-get

commands.description: Deletes an existing note of a merge request.
commands.name: gitlab-merge-request-note-delete

commands.description: Updates an existing merge request. You can change the target branch, title, or even close the merge request.
commands.name: gitlab-merge-request-update

commands.description: Create an issue.
commands.name: gitlab-issue-create

commands.description: Deletes all branches that are merged into the project's default branch.
commands.name: gitlab-merged-branch-delete

commands.description: Cancels a GitLab pipeline.
commands.name: gitlab-cancel-pipeline

commands.description: Using Scope blobs. Blob searches are performed on both filenames and contents.
commands.name: gitlab-code-search

commands.description: Creates a new branch in the repository.
commands.name: gitlab-branch-create

commands.description: Get the list of projects of a given group.
commands.name: gitlab-group-project-list

commands.description: Creates a new merge request.
commands.name: gitlab-merge-request-create

commands.description: Deletes an existing note of an issue.
commands.name: gitlab-issue-note-delete

commands.description: Get a list of visible groups for the authenticated user. When accessed without authentication, only public groups are returned. By default, this request returns 20 results at a time because the API results are paginated.
commands.name: gitlab-group-list

commands.description: Triggers a GitLab pipeline on a selected project and branch.
commands.name: gitlab-trigger-pipeline

commands.description: Gets a list of group or project members viewable by the authenticated user.
commands.name: gitlab-group-member-list

commands.description: Updates an existing project issue. This call is also used to mark an issue as closed. The ID can be taken from gitlab-issue-list.
commands.name: gitlab-issue-update

commands.description: Gets a list of all notes for a single issue.
commands.name: gitlab-issue-note-list

name: GitLab
readme:

Contributions are welcome and appreciated. For more info, visit our [Contribution Guide](https://xsoar.pan.dev/docs/contributing/contributing).
